EmailTemplate.name: TaskRay Assignment Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Task Assignment Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Billing Unassigned,
The following TaskRay Task is assigned to you:
Project: {!TASKRAY__Project_Task__c.Project_Name__c} Task(s): {!TASKRAY__Project_Task__c.Name} (Due: {!TASKRAY__Project_Task__c.TASKRAY__Deadline__c})
User Guide·Idea Forum·Success Community
